definition: to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate

sentences.english: Travel Expert went to Vietnam with i-Cable's crew.
sentences.chinese: 专业旅运随摄制队前往越南拍摄，访寻美食。

sentences.english: Over there, the aggrieved, jun has been seeking private detective, investigating Carrie.
sentences.chinese: 那边厢，愤愤不平的日君已访寻私家侦探，调查嘉莉。

definition: to wander (typically of an errant priest)
to make an investigative visit/to go and find out from the source
lit. I've admired you for a long time (honorific)./I've been looking forward to meeting you./It's an honor to meet you at last.
to employ/to send for sb promising employment
to pay a formal visit/to call to pay respects/to pay homage (at a monument, mausoleum etc)
to recruit talent/to round up/to enlist the services of sb
to live away from home temporarily
